label: A2BC4_tI112_141_gh_f_ghi-001
title: Bi$_{2}$CdO$_{4}$ Structure
comments: (Kirik, 1999) give the coordinates of the oxygen atoms on the (32g) Wyckoff position as (0.1575,0.09252,0.875), however the correct value for x should be 1/4-y = 0.15748.  We made this minor correction to maintain the symmetry.  In practice, the error is less than the measurement error in the sample.
